name: Minale Tattersfield Design Strategy Group
tagline: A 50 year young multidisciplinary design agency
description: Minale Tattersfield is a multi-disciplined design and branding agency that works across various sectors that include food and drink, retail, travel, entertainment, energy, and sport. They have worked with numerous blue chip clients and global brands on leading design projects including Harrods, FA Premier League, Eurostar, Gazprom, Imperial War Museum, ICC (International Cricket Council), Sydney Olympics, BP, TfL (Transport for London), Eurostar, Luxair, and San Pellegrino mineral water.
